member.name: F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsEnums.SystemCommands.MONITORPOWER

member.summary: Takes a STRRET structure returned by IShellFolder::GetDisplayNameOf, converts it to a string, and places the result in a buffer.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathCompactPath(System.IntPtr,System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Int32)
member.summary: Truncates a file path to fit within a given pixel width by replacing path components with ellipses.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the path was successfully compacted to the specified width. Returns FALSE on failure, or if the base portion of the path would not fit the specified width

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathCompactPathEx(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Truncates a path to fit within a certain number of characters by replacing path components with ellipses
member.returns: Returns TRUE if successful, or FALSE otherwise

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathIsFileSpec(System.String)
member.summary: Searches a path for any path delimiting characters (for example, ':' or '\' ). If there are no path delimiting characters present, the path is considered to be a File Spec path
member.returns: Returns TRUE if there are no path delimiting characters within the path, or FALSE if there are path delimiting characters

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathIsPrefix(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Searches a path to determine if it contains a valid prefix of the type passed by pszPrefix. A prefix is one of these types: "C:\\", ".", "..", "..\\"
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the compared path is the full prefix for the path, or FALSE otherwise

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathIsRelative(System.String)
member.summary: Searches a path and determines if it is relative
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the path is relative, or FALSE if it is absolute

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathIsRoot(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a path to determine if it is a directory root
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the specified path is a root, or FALSE otherwise

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathIsSameRoot(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compares two paths to determine if they have a common root component
member.returns: Returns TRUE if both strings have the same root component, or FALSE otherwise

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathIsUNC(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the string is a valid UNC (universal naming convention) for a server and share path
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the string is a valid UNC path, or FALSE otherwise

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathIsUNCServer(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if a string is a valid UNC (universal naming convention) for a server path only
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the string is a valid UNC path for a server only (no share name), or FALSE otherwise

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathIsUNCServerShare(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if a string is a valid universal naming convention (UNC) share path, \\server\share
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the string is in the form \\server\share, or FALSE otherwise

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathIsURL(System.String)
member.summary: Tests a given string to determine if it conforms to a valid URL format
member.returns: Returns TRUE if pszPath has a valid URL format, or FALSE otherwise

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathMakePretty(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Converts a path to all lowercase characters to give the path a consistent appearance
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the path has been converted, or FALSE otherwise

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathMatchSpec(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Searches a string using a DOS wild card match type
member.param: Contains the path to be searched
Contains the file type for which to search. For example, to test whether or not pszFileParam is a DOC file, pszSpec should be set to "*.doc"
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the string matches, or FALSE otherwise

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathParseIconLocation(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Parses a file location string containing a file location and icon index, and returns separate values
member.param: Contains a file location string. It should be in the form "pathname,iconindex". When the function returns, pszIconFile will point to the file's pathname
member.returns: Returns the valid icon index value

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathQuoteSpaces(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Searches a path for spaces. If spaces are found, the entire path is enclosed in quotation marks

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathRelativePathTo(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a relative path from one file or folder to another
member.returns: Returns TRUE if successful, or FALSE otherwise

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathRemoveArgs(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Removes any arguments from a given path

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.APIs.APIsShlwapi.PathRemoveBackslash(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the trailing backslash from a given path
member.returns: Returns the address of the NULL that replaced the backslash, or the address of the last character if it's not a backslash
